item.title: Project 1: Fraud Credit Card Transaction Detector using Machine Learning
item.description: Due to the ongoing pandemic, there is a sudden boom in the E-commerce industry and hence many online sites have increased the online payment modes, increasing the risk for online frauds. Increase in fraud rates, researchers started using different machine learning methods to detect and analyse frauds in online transactions. The main aim of the project is to design and develop a fraud detection model based on the given Dataset.

item.title: Project 2: D-BUG: YOUR CODE COMPANION
item.description: D-BUG is a platform by programmers for programmers. It has been created to help new programmers achieve their beginner goals. It contains programming questions for various languages for practice and has a simple UI which helps people at all levels of programming to understand the content. Link to the Website

item.title: Fundamentals : Machine learning using Python Algorithms
